::WindRider::
"Hey listen" he said to Battera, "I think I'm going to
go outside and get some fresh air, and see what I can
see. You can join me if you like." He smiled at her,
hoping she would accept.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She smiled at him."Thank you for your kind offer.
> I'm sure it will be 
> needed in the future."  She took his hand.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > "Battera", he says, "when that moment comes, I
> will do
> > everything I can to help your cause." He offers
> her
> > his hand.
> 
>
